name: Roasted Balsamic Green Beans
description: The combination of the sweet balsamic and the caramelization that comes from roasting the beans is irresistible. Even the kids like them.

video.name: Roasted Balsamic Green Beans
video.description: Beautifully roasted balsamic green beans are tossed with red onion, cherry tomatoes, almonds, and apple honey. The balsamic lightly caramelizes the green beans resulting in a tender bean with crisp edges.

recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp. Primal Kitchen Extra Virgin olive oil
1 tbsp. Primal Kitchen Balsamic vinegar of Modena

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450F. Line baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 450F. Line baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Place green beans and red onions on baking sheet and toss with olive oil, salt, & pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Place green beans and red onions on baking sheet and toss with olive oil, salt, & pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, in a small bowl whisk the balsamic vinegar, honey, and garlic slices. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, in a small bowl whisk the balsamic vinegar, honey, and garlic slices. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove beans from oven and stir in cherry tomatoes and  slivered almonds,pour the balsamic-honey dressing over  them. Toss with your tongs.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove beans from oven and stir in cherry tomatoes and  slivered almonds,pour the balsamic-honey dressing over  them. Toss with your tongs.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue roasting for 10 more minutes or until beans have begun to shrivel and brown, and are tender but not mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue roasting for 10 more minutes or until beans have begun to shrivel and brown, and are tender but not mushy.

keywords: oven roasted green beans, roasted balsamic green beans, roasted green beans
